00025 #ifndef _BASE_CACHEDIRECTORY_
00026 #define _BASE_CACHEDIRECTORY_
00027 
00028 #include <base/base>
00029 #include <base/VDirectory>
00030 #include <base/CacheFile>
00031 
00032 #include <base/path_not_found>
00033 #include <base/io_error>
00034 
00035 
00036 namespace base {
00037 
00038 class CacheDirectory : public VDirectory
00039 {
00040 public:
00041   virtual ~CacheDirectory();
00042 
00043   virtual String className() const { return String("CacheDirectory"); }
00044   virtual Object& clone() const { return *NewNamedObj(className()) CacheDirectory(*this); }
00045 
00046   virtual void operator=(const CacheDirectory& d);
00047   
00048   virtual bool contains(ref<const VEntry> name) const;
00049   virtual bool contains(const PathName& name) const;
00050 
00051   virtual ref<VFile>      file(const PathName& name) const throw(path_not_found); ///< construct a new VFile object 
00052   virtual ref<VDirectory> directory(const PathName& name) const throw(path_not_found); ///< construct a new VDirectory object
00053 
00054   virtual ref<VFile>      createFile(const PathName& name) const throw(io_error); ///< create a new file in this directory
00055   virtual void            deleteFile(const PathName& name) const throw(path_not_found, io_error); ///< delete a file in this directory
00056   virtual ref<VDirectory> createDirectory(const PathName& name) const throw(io_error); ///< create a new directory in this directory
00057   virtual void            deleteDirectory(const PathName& name) const throw(path_not_found, io_error); ///< delete a directory in this directory
00058 
00059 protected:
00060   ref<VEntry> find(const String& name) const;
00061   ref<VDirectory> actualDir;
00062   String prefix;
00063 
00064   void load() const;
00065   virtual ref<VEntry> entry(Int i) const;
00066   virtual Int size() const;
00067 
00068   mutable bool loaded;
00069   typedef array<ref<CacheFile> > CacheFileEntries;
00070   mutable CacheFileEntries entries;
00071 
00072   CacheDirectory(const CacheDirectory& d);
00073   CacheDirectory(ref<VDirectory> actualDir, const String& prefix);
00074 
00075   friend class Cache;
00076 };
00077 
00078 } // base
